content.description:
Secret Knowledge Of Water climbs the black corner system on the left side of the waterfall and directly up to the bolted rap station for Whitetail Canyon. 

  Overall this route would be only in the easy 5.10 range if it wasn't for the initial boulder problem (V2++) at the second bolt. Nothing some big biceps or hang-dogging cant fix.
content.protection: 3 Bolts   Small Cams (C3's) - Fingers/Thin Hands   Nuts   Draws   Runners
content.location: Black corner system directly below rap station. Start up below steep arete and up towards first 3 bolts. Bust the short boulder problem, after 3rd bolt move right to a ledge and then up broken and thin crack to the top.

content.description: The general waterfall area at the mouth of Whitetail Canyon. Also the location of the main areas rappel station.
